channel.title: Get Ready on ArchiveCon
channel.description: Recent content in Get Ready on ArchiveCon

item.title: Attending ArchiveCon
item.description: In terms of attending the con itself, we will be using three different platforms: Discord, Zoom, and Twitch.

item.title: Artist Alley
item.description: We will have a directory of artists, writers, and artisans (collectively henceforth known as AA Artists) right here on the site for you to peruse while attending ArchiveCon!

item.title: Panels & Events
item.description: Want to host a game, give a talk, organize a roundtable, or do something else fun at ArchiveCon? We’ll be soliciting for programming soon!

item.title: Previous Years
item.description: Looking for inspiration for your next game, panel, or event, or just want to see what we’re about? Peruse some of our previous events to see what kinds of things we love!
